amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sections providing additional eradication resources to Columbia and Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike sections providing additional eradication resources for Columbia and Mexico, and to strike the sense of Congress provision to accord U.S. law enforcement personnel serving in Mexico and Mexican law enforcement personnel serving in the United States the same status as their respective diplomatic and consular personnel.

action.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 67 - 354 (Roll No. 441).
